name: the garden skull.
description:
Story:

In this game, you play as bird that is addicted to pumpkins. Indeed, he is so addicted that he will die very fast without pumpkin. Because of that, he raids gardens very often. But today, he didn't choose very good garden, because it's guarded by the skeleton that monitors every your move and shoots bullets after you. Avoid them at all cost.

Controls:

Movement: Arrows Up and Down
